articles.description: Australia off-spinner Nathan Lyon becomes the eighth player in Test cricket history to take 500 wickets.
articles.title: Lyon takes 500th Test wicket as Australia thrash Pakistan

articles.description: Luton's Premier League match at Bournemouth is stopped after their captain Tom Lockyer collapses on the pitch.
articles.title: Luton captain Lockyer collapses on pitch

articles.description: Phil Salt's stunning century helps England pull off their third-highest T20 international chase as they beat West Indies by seven wickets in the third T20.
articles.title: Salt century helps England chase 223 to beat WI

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says his Manchester City side cannot blame bad luck for their failure to see out games after dropping more points from a winning position on Saturday.
articles.title: Guardiola says Man City 'cannot blame bad luck'

articles.description: MOTD pundit Danny Murphy says the mounting pressure on Manchester United gives Liverpool a rare opportunity when they meet at Anfield on Sunday.
articles.title: Why this is 'a wonderful time' for Liverpool to play Man Utd

articles.description: NBA legend Kareem Abdul-Jabbar is taken to hospital in Los Angeles after breaking his hip in a fall at a concert.
articles.title: NBA legend Kareem Abdul-Jabbar suffers broken hip after fall in Los Angeles

articles.description: The Detroit Lions beat the Denver Broncos 42-17 to edge closer to their first NFL play-off place since 2016.
articles.title: Lions beat Broncos to move closer to play-off spot

articles.description: Final Score's Fara Williams and Dion Dublin discuss whether Manchester City are feeling the mental fatigue of their Treble-winning season after the 2-2 draw with Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Are Man City mentally fatigued after Treble?

articles.description: Liverpool and Scotland legend Sir Kenny Dalglish is to be honoured with the Lifetime Achievement award at BBC Sports Personality of the Year.
articles.title: Dalglish wins BBC Lifetime Achievement award

articles.description: Rampant Ulster storm to an impressive bonus-point win over Racing on a raucous Champions Cup night in Belfast.
articles.title: Ulster grab bonus-point win over Racing
